vision: Sahana aims to become a proficient expert in Software Architecture and Systems Engineering, capable of leading projects and contributing significantly to the organization's technical advancements.

mentoring_goals.name: Software Architecture Mastery
mentoring_goals.objective: To gain a comprehensive understanding of Software Architecture principles and best practices.

activities.name: Study Software Architecture Patterns

resources.name: Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software
resources.notes: A foundational book on software design patterns.

activities.performance_metrics: Successfully design a software architecture for a given problem statement.

activities.name: Review and analyze three renowned software architectures

resources.name: The Architecture of Open Source Applications
resources.notes: A collection of essays on the architecture of popular open source applications.

activities.performance_metrics: Analyze and present findings on three different software architectures.

activities.name: Regular discussions on architectural decisions in ongoing projects
activities.performance_metrics: Participate in at least four project discussions and provide valuable architectural insights.

activities.name: Complete online courses on relevant technologies.
activities.performance_metrics: Complete at least two online courses and demonstrate knowledge in discussions.

activities.name: Engage in hands-on projects using platforms like GitHub.
activities.performance_metrics: Contribute to at least one open-source project or initiate a new project.

activities.name: Study open-source projects to understand best practices.
activities.performance_metrics: Analyze and present findings on best practices from three open-source projects.

activities.name: Engage in online challenges or hackathons.
activities.performance_metrics: Participate in at least two challenges or one hackathon.

activities.name: Watch webinars or tech talks on emerging technologies in the defense sector.
activities.performance_metrics: Attend at least three webinars or tech talks and share insights with the team.

activities.name: Collaborate on open-source projects.
activities.performance_metrics: Collaborate on at least one open-source project and contribute significantly.

activities.name: Engage in online forums or communities related to defense research.
activities.performance_metrics: Actively participate in discussions and establish connections with at least five professionals in the field.

activities.name: Solve problems on platforms like Hackerrank or LeetCode.
activities.performance_metrics: Solve at least 20 problems of varying difficulty.

activities.name: Engage in online brainstorming sessions or discussions.
activities.performance_metrics: Participate in at least two brainstorming sessions and provide valuable input.

activities.name: Write blog posts or articles on platforms like Medium.
activities.performance_metrics: Publish at least two articles on relevant topics.

activities.name: Engage in online group discussions or debates on platforms like Reddit.
activities.performance_metrics: Actively participate in at least five discussions or debates.

activities.name: Study online materials on defense protocols and standards.
activities.performance_metrics: Demonstrate understanding of key defense protocols and standards in discussions.

activities.name: Engage in discussions on defense-focused forums or communities.
activities.performance_metrics: Establish connections with at least three professionals in defense-focused forums.

mentoring_goals.name: Systems Engineering Mastery
mentoring_goals.objective: To delve deep into Systems Engineering methodologies and their applications in real-world scenarios.

activities.name: Understand Systems Engineering Lifecycle

resources.name: INCOSE Systems Engineering Handbook
resources.notes: A guide to the SE process and its application.

activities.feedback_mechanism: Bi-weekly quizzes on Systems Engineering concepts
activities.performance_metrics: Demonstrate understanding of the systems engineering lifecycle in discussions and quizzes.

activities.name: Study Systems Engineering Principles

resources.name: Systems Engineering Principles and Practice
resources.notes: A comprehensive book on Systems Engineering principles.

activities.performance_metrics: Apply learned principles in discussions and practical scenarios.

activities.name: Work on a live project to understand system requirements and design
activities.performance_metrics: Successfully gather, analyze, and document system requirements for a live project. Design a system based on the gathered requirements.

mentoring_goals.name: Collaboration and Communication
mentoring_goals.objective: To foster collaboration and communication skills, essential for leading technical teams.

activities.name: Participate in team meetings and present technical topics
activities.feedback_mechanism: Feedback from peers and mentor after team meetings
activities.performance_metrics: Successfully present at least two technical topics in team meetings and demonstrate improved communication in team settings.

activities.name: Collaborate with other departments to understand the interdisciplinary nature of projects
activities.feedback_mechanism: Feedback from collaborating departments and mentor
activities.performance_metrics: Successfully collaborate on at least one interdisciplinary project and receive positive feedback from collaborating departments.

potential_challenges.challenge: Keeping up with rapidly evolving software architecture trends.
potential_challenges.solution: Regularly attend workshops and webinars, and subscribe to industry journals.

potential_challenges.challenge: Balancing hands-on technical work with the theoretical study of systems engineering and software architecture.
potential_challenges.solution: Allocate specific days or time blocks for theoretical study and hands-on work. Use tools like Trello or Asana for time management.

potential_challenges.challenge: Effective collaboration with other departments and understanding interdisciplinary project requirements.
potential_challenges.solution: Schedule regular inter-departmental meetings and workshops. Use collaboration tools like Slack or Microsoft Teams for effective communication.

potential_challenges.challenge: Maintaining consistent communication skills improvement while engaging in technical tasks.
potential_challenges.solution: Practice public speaking, attend communication workshops, and seek feedback after presentations and meetings.

potential_challenges.challenge: Staying updated with the latest in defense protocols and standards.
potential_challenges.solution: Join defense-focused forums, subscribe to defense journals, and attend defense industry conferences.

potential_challenges.challenge: Ensuring practical application of learned skills in real-world scenarios.
potential_challenges.solution: Engage in live projects, participate in hackathons, and collaborate on open-source platforms.
